autoCastHelp: Parse numbers on all values correctly
channelNameHelp: Set name of the root channel
deleteBeforeUpdateHelp: Remove the values from password keys
descriptions: Object of names for state keys
descriptionsHelp: The state will be expanded after saving
excludeStateWithEndingHelp: Array of strings to exclude states with this ending
expandNowHelp: The state will be expanded after saving
forceIndexHelp: Instead of trying to find names for array entries, use the index as the name. If a key with id, name, label, labelText the value will use a name. This is overriden by preferedArrayName
makeStateWritableWithEndingHelp: Array of strings to make states with this ending writable
parseBase64Help: Parse base64 encoded strings to utf8
parseBase64byIdsHelp: Array of ids to parse base64 encoded strings to utf8
preferedArrayDescHelp: Set key to use this as an array entry description
preferedArrayNameHelp: Set key to use this as an array entry name
statesHelp: Object of states to create for an id, new entries via json will be added automatically to the states
